alert.note: Alert for Garvin (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Garvin County through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paoli, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Paoli and Whitebead. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 69 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
